duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the staff within all hospital support departments and responsible for timely performance feedback, skill, and management development of all Hospital personnel.
Lead the onboarding of new hires and all new hire paperwork as well as orient and train new clinic staff to the hospital and duties.
Review work performance of direct reports, constructively deliver feedback, resolve routine personnel issues and conduct timely performance appraisals.
Manage schedules for technical and administrative staff, coordinate DVM and Support schedules with the Medical Director and achieve and maintain all labor goals.

Ensure compliance with all administrative responsibilities and participate in the annual budget creation process. Ensure daily financial information is accurate and responsible for all local accounting functions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Veterinary Science, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
